project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the application will interact with users through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a new contact
Implement functionality to search for an existing contact
Implement functionality to update an existing contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling for storing contacts
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they work correctly
